content: I am sitting at dinner with ,@,RickSantorum, and Buzz Aldrin. Holy cow!
Tell Rick I say hi. Also, can he recommend a CPR instructor? My certificate is about to expire.
His wife is a nurse.
I know, I’ve known him 25 years ;). Tell him I say hi.
This exchange makes me smile.
Are you from the South? And before you get offended I’m from the South and my grandad firmly believed wrestling was real and the moon landing was fake.
I knew it was a joke, it just sounded like something someone from the South would ask.
Problem with the South?
Are you kidding? I’m from the South!
Good for you, where?
Texas
pic.twitter.com/G0qDgOmFas
Meanwhile.....,pic.twitter.com/RST6Y6Bca9
trust me Ashley,  if the nra were a group of terrorist  believe me you would know it. But they're not.  So bye bye
Buzz Aldrin was my hero when I was a kid even more so when he punched the reporter
Ask Buzz about the "Fire flies" please, God bless
That was John Glenn
Yep.. but they were friends and Buzz almost said something, and then... he shut down...
I'd love to know too!!! Facinating stuff

Took my daughter (highschool, sophmore) to see Nikki Haley today.  Please tell Mr. Santorum, I went to North Hills Christian School in the 90s, met his family, and I say hello!,pic.twitter.com/w1jirmQ6eI
What a great experience
Could you please tell me-is Hogg a/or has he been a registered student at your school?If so was he a bully or loud mouth?
Simple question with no legal liability involved. Info may be available elsewhere but would like to hear from someone at that school due to all the misinformation out there.
So cool!  Get off your phone!  You’re at dinner with Buzz Aldrin!  No offense ,@,RickSantorum,

Order a huge steak if Rick is paying! If Buzz is paying tweet Rick is cheap, that will save Buzz a little. Congrats get all you can from the many great leaders you are meeting with. Perhaps you might decide to run for offi e yourself. America needs you. 
Rick Carey USN Retired
Thank you for your service Rick Carey.
You are most welcome, it was the honor of my life.  Oh, and I don't know Mr. Santorum, just figured another Rick could treat an American hero to dinner...  keep smilin'.
No way!  Buzz Aldrin!
I met him in Tennessee...he's crazy
Crazy good is great!

Lol no like I actually think he's going insane. He was speaking at an event called DI globals in which we competed against teams acroos the world... Including Vietnam... He then proceeded to brag about "how much shit he dropped on the Vietcong"... You could here a pin drop
You are destined for GREATNESS Kyle
I know right???
boy the questions I would have for Buzz.
Now ask him off the record how he lives with himself for lying all these years about space travel and walking on the moon. Ask him why the lie! (Make sure you record him at least in audio)
Tin foil hat a little too tight??

An honor. Exciting. 
Now, put your phone down. In fact, turn it off.  Enjoy.
The fact that you know who they are is amazing...
Setting the bar kind of low aren't you?
With today's education system, and the level of ignorance/illiteracy of melenials on average, am I?
Based on what I hear spewing forth from conservatives you're right. They're so easily influenced by Faux News.
Spew some ,#,Resist, crap then, we need more joke material for you people
Its a troll, just mute it. No brain behind that keyboard.

Kyle, you need to meet with Mark Robinson (I am the majority) from North Carolina.
Check him on youtube.
Pic or it didnt happen.
WOW! Nice! Be sure to brace yourself for all the 'we didn't really go to the moon' nut jobs to come flooding in.
Make sure Rick shows you how to perform CPR.
Make sure your less than 100 sympathy followers take notes. This, is how people make change. Not talking to people with pink hats and condoms shoved down his or her throat!
You look smart...
You dont
pic.twitter.com/T4qjZI6Dt9
How rude to be on your phone while at dinner. But honestly...I expect nothing less...you disappoint me. Let the attacks commence.
Mr Perfect speaks.
@,KyleKashuv, deleted that pic...interesting. Guess advisors rethought I,t. Even my 13 y/o thought I,t was in poor taste tweeting/ having electronics out at dinner...

Glad your kids are perfect! Mine too, but sometimes an occasion changes things for a moment. Could you not find something good about what he was doing. A 16 year old is meeting with people to help bring about safety for your daughter. He’s not spewing profanity laced speeches.

I’m not arrogant enough to say my child is perfect like you did...but HE does have manners. ALL these kids need to be in school, regardless of their political position. What’s the “occasion”? Is I,t the same “occasion” that has him tweeting constantly?

What is the occasion? It wasn’t a school field trip to drop in an see how govt works. It was an invitation to speak with govt leaders about 1a,2A. It’s not our concern if he is in school or not. It’s mom, dad and school. But I’m sure conversing (next tweet)
Soak it all up! You are our future ,@,KyleKashuv,!!!

That is awesome, ,@,KyleKashuv,!! You have been proving yourself to be a leader, and leaders are drawn to other leaders!
Way to go!
You deserve it! You bring a lot to the conversation! Thank you for your bravery and sticking up for Americans 2nd amendment rights!! You've got a bright future!
2 great Americans

Pssst. Put your phone down and take notes. 
This kinda thing can look great on your Resume. When you work as an intern at the White House. Go for life with Gusto. Kyle. ,#,MakingAmericaGreatAgain, and ,#,MakingAmericaGreat
Buzz Aldrin, wow.  You are living the American dream!
While Hogg is having reheated Chinese food in Hillary's burnt out attic. Nothing against Chinese food or attics.
That is beyond awesome!!
Networking with the best... good for you, Kyle!
Both great men. Awesome mentors!!!
Don’t make Buzz mad:,https://,youtu.be/GNkViBQ9EvY,
Because young men like you get things done! Not just stand in the street screaming
pic.twitter.com/Wb04ZDAwbX

They are probably just as thrilled to have your company. Mad props, Kyle. You are not a loud voice but you have wisdom beyond your years so people are listening. So proud of you...if you setup a college fund let us know...
It’s nice to see young peeps can stir experience “awe”
Congrats Kyle! U parents must be so proud!
Awesome Kyle!  You are an outstanding young man, and I’m sure the privilege was theirs too!!
Omg why wasnt i invited!! Take it all in, kiddo!! That is AWESOME!
You’re gonna go far kid! ,#,MAGA
One nominated me for West Point, and the other went to West Point. Cool stuff!
I’m happy for you, Kyle. Take a , with them.
Awesomeness!
Excellent work, young sir!
You have the epitome of science and the antipathy of science at the same table. Impressive.
Tell them we all say hello!
Good for you Kyle!! Enjoy.
Lucky!
Enjoy it! Buzz is certainly a character!
We are all proud of you Kyle.
Awesome!!

Rick Santorum, Buzz Aldrin, and Justice Clarence Thomas beat tf out of Ellen, Maher, and Miley Cyrus all day, every day.
You're in your groove, kiddo.

(*btw, it's time for some new ties to go with that new suit.,)
Lucky guy!
Man, you are one lucky guy! Or perhaps they are are the lucky ones. :)
Had Buzz Aldrin on a flight one time. Came up to say hello. It was an honor to shake his hand.
Then put the phone down
Well done!
Sounds pretty cool. Enjoy and take pictures. One day nobody will believe it. Lol
Tell them hello and thank you, from me!
To put your phone down and listen, 4 years of college can't replace the next 40 minutes.
Just a hint -- Buzz killed the last guy who accused him of faking the moon landing. So, be nice. ;-)
Better than anything Disney has!!
Hell yeah. Buzz is one awesome guy. Just don't ask him if the moon landings were faked. His boxing skills come out. lol
Good for you!!!
Wow! Are you lucky!
Buzz Aldrin is a very sweet guy.
And good ole David hogg is at home Beatin meat rn
Wow. Must be exciting!!!

Normal.
Great

Very cool. Enjoy!

Nice

We need a CIRCUMCISION BAN, PUNISHMENT FOR THE PERPETRATORS, and gov't funding for Foregen to use tissue regeneration to regenerate our foreskins and make our bodies whole again!!! Boys deserve EQUAL PROTECTION under law!,pic.twitter.com/zlJDJTa1iS

Wow, keep up the good work.
@ him. ,@,TheRealBuzz, is a Twitter God.

Buzz Aldrin?!? Lucky. As an engineer I’m jealous as hell.

That's because you are a humble individual trying to actually make a good change in the right ways. Keep doing what you do. Many others like those two will want to sit down and have dinner with you too
An American hero and a failed senator?
Ok, now you're bragging.
A real kid (i mean in a good way). You're not a fake kid.
Good for you!!! Well deserved.
Awesome young man. Keep up the good work to support our 2nd amendment!  You are a Class Act, unlike Hogg!
And?
Buzz Aldrin ridiculed Trump, in front of Trump, at a press conference, making faces at everything Trump said. I will never forget that. Buzz Aldrin's a jerk. Please tell him we feel this way.
Wow , hopefully you can eat with all the excitement.
Be very careful son.
Good for you!
Wow. What an honor. Buzz is the real deal
Quick tip, Buzz favors his right hook, use a Joe Frazier style "defensive pressure" bob and weave.
SWEET!
thanks for not being David Hogg and being someone your generation can be proud of
Too cool.

Nice work if you can get it! Congratulations!

I hope you put down that gun, son, and learn CPR right quick!

~ Wow, that is worth a Holy Cow!
You go kid! You give us old timers hope!
@,TheRealBuzz
One's a space case and the other's an astronaut!
Something you will never forget.  Congratulations.

Lucky!  Buzz is the MAN!

One of the inspirations for me getting into aviation.

You lucky man
Buzz Aldrin awesome, one of my childhood heroes , but don’t be over awed by politicians.
Good on you, Kyle!
Congrats bro!! Keep up the good fight!!
Good job Kyle

I am truly happy for you Kyle. Write a plan that incorporates your introductions to influential people to help Americans improve their lives and standing in the world. Imagine their full potential realized. A sovereign State that protects and takes care of its own people first.
Please tell them to stop allowing Medicare to cut benefits and raise Rx prices.
Excellent! You are so fortunate! Need pictures posted!
Cool!
Envy is one of the seven deadlies, don'tcha know.
Cool. Yeah, I wouldn't eat dinner with ,@,RickSantorum, without a Buzz.
Congratulations! Now stop tweeting and mingle!

Buzz Aldrin is on my bucket list and my dad went to college with Neil Armstrong.

If you are "sitting at dinner" with anyone, DON'T BE ON YOUR PHONE. It's rude. Other than that, I hope you have a great evening , You are certainly making some fabulous memories to tell your kids one day, lol.

Soak it in :)
